Front-end.title: Frontend Frameworks
Front-end.description: Competency in the popular frontend framework Svelte and expertise in SCSS. Additionally, consider acquiring skills in other frontend technologies like React.js, Vue.js, or Angular.

Back-end.title: PHP
Back-end.description: Proficient in PHP for server-side web development, with expertise in building dynamic and scalable web applications.

Back-end.title: Node.js
Back-end.description: Highly skilled in Node.js for server-side JavaScript development, with experience in building game servers for Unity games.

Back-end.title: Databases
Back-end.description: Competent in database design and management with a focus on SQL (including MySQL and Microsoft SQL Server) and NoSQL databases (such as MongoDB).

Back-end.title: Cloud
Back-end.description: Familiar with cloud platforms such as AWS and Azure.

Unity.title: C#
Unity.description: Proficient in C# programming for Unity game development, with expertise in creating interactive gameplay and optimizing game performance.

Unity.title: Game Development
Unity.description: Skilled in developing 2D and 3D games in Unity, including gameplay mechanics, user interfaces, and game optimization.

Unity.title: UI Design
Unity.description: Proficient in designing user interfaces (UI) for Unity games, ensuring a seamless and engaging player experience.

Unity.title: Unity Asset Development
Unity.description: Experience in creating and optimizing custom Unity assets to enhance game development workflows and improve game performance.

Unity.title: Multiplayer
Unity.description: Knowledge of implementing multiplayer functionality in Unity games, enabling online and multiplayer gaming experiences.

Additional.title: Version Control
Additional.description: Proficiency in version control systems like Git and experience in collaborative software development.

Additional.title: Cloud
Additional.description: Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS and Azure.

Additional.title: API
Additional.description: Knowledge of designing and developing RESTful APIs for web and mobile applications.

Additional.title: CMS
Additional.description: Experience in working with content management systems like WordPress for web content management.

Additional.title: Docker
Additional.description: Experience in containerization using Docker for efficient deployment and management of applications.

Additional.title: Postman
Additional.description: Proficiency in using Postman for API testing and development, including automated testing and documentation.

Additional.title: ChatGPT
Additional.description: Proficiency in prompt programming and adept at knowledge searching using advanced language models like ChatGPT.
